name: Sunbreaker
description:
In Sunbreaker you have to let the plants grow on the ground by shining light on it. But the clouds absorb your light and release the energy by creating lightning bolts and destroy the ground under them. The game was made pretty quick and is unpolished but I do not plan to add bigger features in future.

Controls:
A/D: Move the sun to the left/right.
Space: Release your energy in the form of light.
